title: Job Vacancies at Property Brokers Magazine
content:
Property Brokers Magazine is a comprehensive security solutions provider that leverages intelligent security solutions supported by civilized guards with its global security technology partnerships; we have been able to secure the trust of residential, commercial, government, and industrial customers throughout Nigeria and beyond.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Content Creator

Job Location: Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	A Content Creator is responsible for producing engaging and relevant content for digital and print platforms to attract and engage a target audience.
	This includes blog posts, social media content, videos, graphics, and marketing materials aligned with the organization’s brand voice and marketing goals.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop creative and engaging content for social media, blogs, websites, and campaigns.
	Collaborate with marketing and design teams to align content with branding.
	Monitor content performance and adapt strategies accordingly.
	Stay updated on content trends and audience preferences.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a relevant qualifications with experience.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter in PDF as a single document to: hadaba.gresource@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

2.) HR / Admin Officer

Job Location: Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	An HR/Admin Officer manages human resource functions and administrative duties within an organization.
	This includes recruitment, onboarding, payroll processing, employee relations, office management, and compliance with labor laws.
	The role ensures smooth daily operations and a productive workplace environment.


Key Responsibilities


	Handle recruitment, selection, and onboarding processes.
	Maintain employee records and handle payroll and benefits administration.
	Ensure HR policies and procedures are up to date and legally compliant.
	Manage office supplies, correspondence, and administrative support functions.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor’s Degree with 3 years work experience. 


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Cover Letter and CV for a specific job role in PDF as a single document, attached in an email to: hadaba.gresource@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

3.) Communication Specialist

Job Location: Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	A Communication Specialist is responsible for developing and implementing internal and external communication strategies.
	This includes crafting press releases, coordinating media relations, managing social media platforms, and ensuring consistent messaging across all channels.
	This role supports brand awareness, stakeholder engagement, and organizational transparency.


Key Responsibilities


	Create and distribute content for press releases, websites, newsletters, and social media.
	Manage media relations and respond to media inquiries.
	Support internal communications and employee engagement initiatives.
	Ensure consistent branding and messaging across platforms.


Qualifications


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor’s Degree with 3 years of work experience.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their cover letter and CV in PDF as a single document, attached in an email to: hadaba.gresource@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail

title: Job Openings at Cross Beverage Company Limited
content:
Cross Beverage Company Limited - We are a Nigerian startup producing a portfolio of affordable, daily consumed drink products.Our products positions us to meet both everyday hydration needs and the demand for flavored, wholesome beverage in the Nigerian market.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Machine Operator

Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	Cross Beverage Nigeria Limited is seeking a dedicated Machine Operator to join our production team in the pure water and table water unit.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for operating and maintaining production machines used in water filtration, filling, sealing, and packaging processes.
	You will play a key role in ensuring product quality, machine efficiency, and compliance with safety and hygiene standards.
	This role requires a proactive individual with attention to detail and a commitment to operational excellence in a fast-paced manufacturing environment.


Responsibilities
Machine Operation & Production Efficiency:


	Set up, operate, and monitor water treatment and packaging machines to ensure smooth and efficient production flow.
	Carry out basic troubleshooting and minor maintenance tasks to reduce downtime and maintain machine performance.
	Monitor production output and ensure water is filled, sealed, and packaged according to company specifications.
	Keep accurate records of machine operations, daily output, and equipment issues.
	Coordinate with the production supervisor to meet daily and weekly production targets.


Quality Assurance, Safety & Hygiene:


	Perform routine quality checks to ensure the purity of water and integrity of packaging (e.g., proper sealing, labeling, and fill levels).
	Maintain cleanliness of machines and work area in line with company hygiene standards.
	Adhere strictly to workplace safety protocols and use appropriate PPE at all times.
	Report any quality issues, equipment malfunctions, or safety hazards immediately to the supervisor.
	Support compliance with NAFDAC regulations and internal quality control procedures.


Requirements and Qualifications


	SSCE/OND or equivalent qualification.
	Minimum of 1 year experience in a production or factory environment (preferably in water, beverage, or FMCG).
	Basic understanding of machinery operations and minor maintenance.
	Strong attention to detail and ability to follow instructions accurately.
	Physically fit and able to stand for extended periods.
	Willingness to work shifts, including weekends and public holidays as required.


Salary
N40,000 - N50,000 Monthly.

Application Closing Date: 10th October, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified caniddates should send their CV and Application Letter to: humanresources@crossbeverage.com / humanresourcescrossbeverages@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: For more information, call 08162332499.

 

 

2.) Junior Accountant

Job Location: Tose, Ibadan - Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	Cross Beverage Nigeria Limited is seeking a Junior Accountant to support our financial operations.
	The role involves managing daily transactions, ensuring compliance with tax laws and accounting standards, and assisting with financial reporting, budgeting, and cost control.
	The successful candidate will provide accurate records and insights to aid management decision-making.


Key Responsibilities


	Prepare and maintain financial records, reports, and reconciliations.
	Handle accounts payable/receivable, payroll, and expense management.
	Monitor cash flow and support budgeting/forecasting processes.
	Ensure compliance with tax regulations and company policies.
	Provide regular financial updates to the MD and HR.


Requirements & Qualifications


	HND / B.Sc. in Accounting, Finance, or a related field.
	2 - 3 years of relevant accounting/finance experience.
	Strong knowledge of accounting principles.
	Proficiency in Excel and accounting software (QuickBooks, Sage, or ERP).
	ICAN / ACCA in view is an added advantage.


Salary
N40,000 - N50,000 / Month.

Application Closing Date: 19th September, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified caniddates should send their CV and Application Letter to: humanresources@crossbeverage.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

3.) Driver

Job Location: Tose - Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Safe, timely delivery of products
	Maintain and service vehicle
	Obey traffic rules & company policies


Requirements


	Valid driver’s license
	Driving experience
	Knowledge of Ibadan routes
	Responsible, punctual, trustworthy
	Good communication skills


Application Closing Date: 1st October, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Credentials to: humanresources@crossbeverage.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
